sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC = Class.create();
jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC.prototype = {

    /** 
     * Initialize the Object with already successfully processed request
     */
    initialize: function(reqId) {
	this.reqId = reqId;
    },
    /**
     * Start the clone worker by using given paramteres
     * 
     * @param usersList (Array of Users sysIds) - All users list for whom the request needs to be cloned
     * @param isBackground (boolean) - Should the process run in bakground (After closing the window)
     * @param referrer (String) - Which page/widget is calling the API
     * 
     * @return progressID (String) - Progress Id of created clone worker to keep track of progress
     */
    startWorker: function(usersList, isBackground, referrer) {
	var processID = undefined;
	try {
		var cloneWorker = new GlideCatalogCloneWorker();
		cloneWorker.setRequest(this.reqId);
		cloneWorker.setUserList(usersList);
		cloneWorker.setBackground(isBackground);
		cloneWorker.setEngagementChannel("ec");
		cloneWorker.setReferrer(referrer);
		cloneWorker.start();
		processID = cloneWorker.getProgressID();
	} catch (ex) {
		gs.error("jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC: Error Occurred: "+ ex);
	}
        return processID;
    },

    /**
     * Fetch the Progress for provided processID (Worker ID)
     * 
     * @param processId (String) - Clone Worker Progress ID created in start to track progress
     * 
     * @return result (Object) - JSON with progress details
     */
    getProgress: function(processId) {
	var result = {};
        var pgr = new GlideRecord('sys_progress_worker');
        if (pgr.get(processId))
            result = {
                name: pgr.name + '',
                message: pgr.message + '',
                output_summary: pgr.output_summary + '',
                state: pgr.state + ''
            };
        return result;
    },

    type: 'jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-03 21:32:53</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>4a602cab7729311028ac75173e5a99db</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>jny_blk_progress_trackerSNC</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Human Resources Scoped App: Security" source="com.snc.hr.scoped_security">fa9f189047320210cd4e1ce4316d43de</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4a602cab7729311028ac75173e5a99db</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-10-03 22:56:02</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
